name: Macromedia Flash FLV Video File Format
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">flv</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Binary file format that delivers bitmapped video, limited to one video and one audio stream per file, over the Internet to one or another versions of the Macromedia Flash Player. In 2005, Adobe Systems Incorporated acquired Macromedia. During this year, under the Macromedia brand, the company published specifications for version 8 of the SWF file format together with documentation of the FLV format.
